data.message:
GIF

 Graphic Interchange Format/Graphic Image File.
"Guh" Hard G for Graphic.

I don't know where people are getting the soft J sound.

No.

replies.message: The creator intended for it to be pronounced with a soft J sound (like the peanut butter brand). As far as the G standing for the word Graphic, a lot of acronyms are not pronounced based on the words they represent. Scuba, laser, taser, radar, NASA, UNICEF, IMAX, PIN, snafu, and FUBAR just to name a few.
The creator who is an idiot that probably barely passed high school English. I'm shocked he hasn't been sued by the peanut butter company.
